subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Buffalo defensive end Anthony Hargrove is running out of second chances with the Bills, who are considering releasing him after he landed in trouble for the second time this summer. A week after being arrested following a scuffle with police officers outside a bar, he was suspended for the first four regular-season games for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy.
